milestone_title: Field survey: Heron Bay site notes captured
milestone_description: Ground-truthing notes collected (tide/wind/salinity/clarity; flagged silted areas; recommended placement zones and sanctuary approach).

milestone_title: Digital survey of feasible planting locations completed
milestone_description: Digitally surveyed feasible planting locations from Mississippi Sound to Fort Morgan via aerial imagery.

milestone_title: Oyster needs calculated for plots to reach target density
milestone_description: Calculated oysters needed to stock plots to ~50 oysters/m².
Prepare and submit USACE permitting approach for intertidal/tidal-creek planting footprint (as described in plan).

milestone_title: Pilot intertidal/tidal-creek plantings in Little Bay & Lightning Point
milestone_description: Pilot projects beginning in July; intertidal focus to reduce anoxia and predation risks, allow frequent checks.
Begin field surveys to confirm suitability and refine planting map/plot list.
Start deployments in Heron Bay sections A–C as initial prioritized plantings.
Complete survey work needed to support later Fort Morgan planting phase.

milestone_title: Survey additional locations (East Fowl River, Eastern Shore, Weeks Bay, Oyster Bay)
milestone_description: Run surveys on additional candidate locations listed in plan.

milestone_title: Begin planting: Heron Bay C–E and Goat Island
milestone_description: Scale plantings into additional Heron Bay sections and Goat Island.

milestone_title: Evaluate intertidal plantings for success; continue adaptive restocking
milestone_description: Assess survivorship/recruitment and maintain target densities where feasible.

milestone_title: Bay-wide 2030 target achieved (oysters deployed + performance standards)
milestone_description: By end of 2030: ~10M oysters deployed and network performance targets (survival, year-classes, recruitment) assessed.
